item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
``Duties:
- Edit video footage to create high-quality and engaging content
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects
- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running of the final product
- Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry's best practices to maximize efficiency ```Requirements:```
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role - Proficient in using film editing software such as Adobe Premiere, Adobe After Effects, and Adobe Creative Suite
- Familiarity with other editing software like Adobe Bridge, Capture One, and Maya is a plus
- Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages
- Strong understanding of post-production techniques including color grading, audio mixing, and typography
- Excellent attention to detail with a creative mind and storytelling skills
- Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively with a team
- Strong time management skills to meet project deadlines If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills to bring stories to life through visual content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team of talented professionals and contribute to creating compelling videos that captivate audiences.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 17:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Content Creator in Natural Health Sector - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for talented individuals to create engaging social media content in the natural health sector. As a content creator, you will be responsible for developing informative videos, eye-catching info-graphics, and entertaining content that resonates with our target audience. This role requires a strong understanding of the natural health industry and the ability to craft compelling stories that educate and entertain.

Key Skills:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Ability to create visually appealing info-graphics using tools like Canva or Adobe Illustrator
- Excellent storytelling and communication skills
- Knowledge of current social media trends and best practices
- Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $10.00-$38.00

item.title: Animated Marketing Video Creator for Landscaping Company - Upwork
item.description:
We are a professional landscaping company looking for an experienced animated marketing video creator to help us promote our services. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio showcasing their skills in creating engaging and informative videos.
  Responsibilities:
  - Create eye-catching animated marketing videos that effectively communicate our brand and services.
  - Collaborate with our marketing team to develop video concepts and scripts.
  - Utilize animation software and tools to bring ideas to life.
  - Ensure videos are delivered on time and meet our quality standards.
  
  Requirements:
  - Proven experience in creating animated marketing videos.
  - Proficiency in animation software such as Adobe After Effects, Blender, or similar.
  - Strong storytelling and visual communication skills.
  - Excellent attention to detail and ability to work under tight deadlines.
  
  If you are a creative and talented animated marketing video creator with a passion for landscaping, we would love to hear from you! Please provide examples of your previous work along with your application.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00

item.title: Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a talented video editor to help create social media content for our agencies clients.
You will be working in a team environment to collaborate and create vertical video content.

We pay $30 per reel under 1 minute and $40 for reels that are more complex/longer

You will:

-edit and re-arrange clips as you see fit
-color grade
-add music
-add in video captions and animate
-sound effects as needed
-use of stock footage. b-roll, or animations as needed

I will provide a full project brief once you are hired for this project.

-must be proficient in english
-Please be able to edit in Premiere Pro
-skills in after effects is a plus
-Have a strong understanding of social media

I am looking for an editor to join my team and take on consistent work. So, if this goes well, there will be more coming.

Please view these videos for reference of the quality that the work must be done in:

https://www.instagram.com/p/C8kZKpLPqxQ/

https://www.instagram.com/p/C8KWg-VOdg9/

Budget: $30

item.title: Seeking Videographer for Milestone Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
I co-own an interior and landscape design firm. Our firm has been working on creating short "milestone," videos that help our clients better understand where they are within our design process and help them to understand what to expect next.

We will expect to have these on our YouTube channel and be able to provide them via links to clients' emails.

We are open to all types of post-production editing. Our biggest concern is to ensure our message/brand flows through each video created.

We've created scripts for each Milestone video and we do have a Milestone video example of what we are looking for, but we are open to your recommendations.

item.title: Real Estate Drone Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I have a set of drone clips of a residential home that I would like to make into a short video. Light color grading needed. No music. I am thinking 1 video that is 60 seconds long and then a couple smaller videos of 15 seconds.

I am looking for deliverables that are formatted for website use as well as social media use.

Also - I am looking to see if it possible to remove objects from the video. Specifically 2 pool floats that are laying on the lawn and perhaps a person standing in some of the clips. Can these be removed?

I have a sample clip for you to look at. I can't attach it to this job listing because it is larger then the 100mb size limit. Once you message regarding this job listing I can share a dropbox link.

This is a single job as of right now but hoping to create an ongoing business relationship for future drone video work as well.


Hourly Range: $33.00-$85.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 16:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Real Estate Video, Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, Video Cleanup, Video Editing, Drone, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Real Estate Video, Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, Video Cleanup, Video Editing, Drone, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Experienced Video Editing & CGI Expert Needed for Commercial Project - Upwork
item.description:
We are EEVE, innovators in garden technology, and we're seeking a skilled video editing and CGI Expert to enhance our latest commercial featuring Willow, our advanced garden robot. We need your expertise to bring the footage to life with professional editing and captivating CGI effects.

Objective:
To produce a polished, engaging commercial that showcases the capabilities of Willow in a visually stunning manner.

Footage:
Raw footage will be provided from our recent shoot, which needs editing, color grading, and the incorporation of CGI elements to highlight the futuristic features of Willow.

Scope of Work:
- Comprehensive video editing, including cutting, sequencing, and pacing to create a cohesive and engaging narrative.
- Advanced color grading to enhance the visual appeal of the garden setting.
- Creation and integration of CGI effects to illustrate the innovative features of Willow and its interaction with the environment.
- Sound design and final mix, including background music and sound effects that complement the visual effects.
- Delivery of the final cut in various formats suitable for web, television, and promotional events.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in video editing and CGI for commercial projects, with a portfolio showcasing past work.
- Strong proficiency in industry-standard editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro) and CGI tools (e.g., After Effects, Cinema 4D).
- Ability to collaborate closely with our creative team to understand and implement the vision for the commercial.
- Excellent communication skills and adherence to project timelines.
- Availability to start immediately and deliver the finished product within a specified deadline.

What We Offer:
- Competitive compensation based on experience and the scope of work.
- Opportunity to work on a groundbreaking product commercial that may lead to further projects with EEVE as we expand our market presence.

Application:
Please apply with the following:
- A brief introduction of you and your experience with commercial video editing and CGI.
- A link to your portfolio, especially highlighting projects with a focus on technology or innovative products.

We are excited to find the right person to help us tell Willow's story in the most compelling way possible. Let’s create something amazing together!



Hourly Range: $20.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 16:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.title: Expert Video Editor Needed! - Upwork
item.description:
We are a dynamic and rapidly growing company in the pain relief niche. We are currently looking for a talented and experienced video editor to join our team and help us elevate our video content. We have a variety of video projects, including VSLs, but we lack a dedicated full-time video editor to ensure the quality and timely delivery of these projects.

Job Responsibilities

- Create High-Quality VSLs: Produce high-quality Video Sales Letters (VSLs) that effectively communicate our brand message and engage our audience.
- Source Content/Clips: Find and utilize appropriate content and clips to enhance video projects.
- Create 2D Animations: Design and implement 2D animations for various video projects (3D animation skills are a plus).
- Collaborate with the Team: Work closely with the marketing and creative teams to understand project requirements and deliver video content that aligns with our goals.
- Ensure Timely Delivery: Manage multiple projects simultaneously and ensure that all videos are completed and delivered on time.
- Video Editing: Edit raw footage into polished final products, including adding effects, graphics, sound, and music.
- Quality Control: Review and improve video content to ensure it meets the highest standards of quality and consistency.
- Stay Updated: Keep up with the latest trends and techniques in video editing to continuously improve our content.

Qualifications:

- Proven experience as a video editor with a strong portfolio of previous work.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro.
- Excellent understanding of video production, including sound, lighting, and post-production techniques.
- Strong attention to detail and a creative mindset.
- Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
- Experience in creating VSLs or similar marketing videos is a plus.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 16:32 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Expert Video Editor Needed for Long-Form Video Slicing in 4K - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a highly skilled and efficient video editor to join our team on a freelance basis. The primary task will involve slicing long-form videos into shorter segments while maintaining the original 4K high-definition quality. This role requires a keen eye for detail, an excellent command of video editing software, and a good sense of timing and storytelling to ensure that each segment is engaging and seamlessly produced.

Responsibilities:

Review and slice long-form videos into smaller, concise segments.
Maintain the integrity and quality of 4K video throughout the editing process.
Ensure each video segment is free of errors and transitions smoothly.
Work closely with our team to adhere to content themes and style guidelines.
Manage multiple video projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing with a portfolio showcasing your work.
Expertise in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve.
Ability to work with 4K video content and understand the technical aspects of video formats and codecs.
Strong organizational and time management skills.
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
Ability to follow creative direction and feedback.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in creating engaging content for social media or digital platforms.
Creative storytelling abilities.
Knowledge of sound editing and color grading.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 16:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Uploading and Trending Topics Research - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a freelancer to assist us with daily video uploading on YouTube and researching topics of trending categories. The main responsibilities of this role include uploading videos to our platform and conducting research to identify popular topics that align with our target audience. The ideal candidate should have strong attention to detail, excellent research skills, be able to use Chatgbt, and a passion for staying up-to-date with the latest trends. Knowledge of video editing software and SEO best practices is a plus.

Skills required:

- Video uploading
- Research
- Attention to detail
- Trend analysis
- Content curation

This is a small-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We seek an entry-level freelancer willing to learn and grow in this role.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 16:20 UTC
Category: General Research Services
Skills:Topic Research, Writing, Data Entry, Social Media Marketing, YouTube, YouTube Automation, YouTube Monetization, YouTube Marketing, English
Skills: Topic Research, Writing, Data Entry, Social Media Marketing, YouTube, YouTube Automation, YouTube Monetization, YouTube Marketing, English
Country: United States
click to apply
